channel.title: Black Mesa Close Caption Compile Error
channel.description:
You're using the Source 2007 compiler with our retail engine. I'd imagine that's the problem.
Kevin's completely rewritten all the closed caption files anyway, so if you're working on a translation, you might want to hold off until the next update, when we hope to roll those out. Old files won't work anymore.

item.title: Black Mesa Close Caption Compile Error
item.dc:creator: Stapheen
item.source: Black Mesa Close Caption Compile Error

item.title: Black Mesa Close Caption Compile Error
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
Use the compiler supplied with the retail version. It’s in the bin folder.

The next update will be within a few months.

Read full topic

TextFAMGUY1:

You’re using the Source 2007 compiler with our retail engine. I’d imagine that’s the problem.

Kevin’s completely rewritten all the closed caption files anyway, so if you’re working on a translation, you might want to hold off until the next update, when we hope to roll those out. Old files won’t work anymore.

on which source will it work?
and when is the next update?

thanks!
